1.1.2. «Персональные данные» - любая инф: 1.1.2. “Personal data” - any information relating to a directly or indirectly identified or identifiable individual (subject of personal data).

1.1.4. «Конфиденциальность персональных: 1.1.4. “Confidentiality of personal data” is a mandatory requirement for the site Administration to comply with to prevent their intentional distribution without the consent of the subject of personal data or the presence of another legal basis.

1.1.6. «Cookies» - небольшой фрагмент да: 1.1.6. “Cookies” are a small piece of data sent by a web server and stored on the user’s computer, which a web client or web browser sends to the web server each time in an HTTP request when an attempt is made to open a page on the corresponding site.
1.1.7. «IP-адрес» - уникальный сетевой а: 1.1.7. “IP address” is a unique network address of a node in a computer network built using the IP protocol, through which the User gains access to the INNWORK website

4. ЦЕЛИ СБОРА ПЕРСОНАЛЬНОЙ ИНФОРМАЦИИ ПО: 4. PURPOSES OF COLLECTING USER’S PERSONAL INFORMATION
4.1. Администрация сайта может использов: 4.1. The Site Administration may use the User’s personal data for the following purposes:
•\tИдентификация Пользователя, зарегистр: •	Identification of the User registered on the INNWORK website for placing an order and (or) concluding an Agreement.
•\tПредоставление Пользователю доступа к: •	Providing the User with access to personalized resources of the INNWORK website.
•\tУстановление обратной связи с Пользов: •	Establishing feedback with the user, including sending notifications, requests regarding the use of the INNWORK website, provision of services, processing requests and applications from the User.
•\tОпределение местоположения Пользовате: •	Determining the location of the User to ensure security and prevent fraud.
•\tПодтверждение точности и полноты пред: •	Confirmation of the accuracy and completeness of the personal data provided by the User.
•\tСоздание учетной записи для совершени: •	Creating an account for making purchases, if the User has agreed to create an account.
•\tУведомление Пользователя сайта INNWOR: •	Notifications to the User of the INNWORK website about the status of the Order.
•\tОбработка и получение платежей, подтв: •	Processing and receiving payments, confirming taxes or tax benefits, disputing a payment, determining the User's eligibility for a line of credit.
•\tПредоставление Пользователю эффективн: •	Providing the User with effective customer and technical support if problems arise with the use of the INNWORK website.
•\tПредоставление Пользователю с его сог: •	Providing the User with his consent, product updates, special offers, information and prices, newsletters and other information on behalf of the site or on behalf of the partners of the INNWORK site.
•\tОсуществление рекламной деятельности: •	Carrying out advertising activities with the consent of the User
•\tПредоставление Пользователю доступа к: •	Providing the User with access to third-party sites or services of partners of this site in order to receive their offers, updates or services.
